Listing 11.8: Example output from making an average forecast.
We can update the function to support averaging over seasonal data, respecting the seasonal
oﬀset. An oﬀset argument can be added to the function that when not set to 1 will determine
the number of prior observations backwards to count before collecting values from which to
include in the average. For example, if n=1 and oﬀset=3, then the average is calculated from
